head: USA TODAY Candidate Emojis

politicians.name: Hillary Clinton
politicians.quote: Americans have fought their way back from tough economic times, but the deck is still stacked in favor of those at the top. Everyday Americans need a champion and I want to be that champion.

politicians.name: Joe Biden
politicians.quote: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam,

politicians.name: Ben Carson
politicians.quote: I'm not a anti-government person by any stretch of the imagination. I think the government, as described in our Constitution, is wonderful. But now we've gone far beyond what our Constitution describes, and we've begun to just allow it to expand based on what the political class wants, because they like to increase their power and their dominion over the people.

politicians.name: Ted Cruz
politicians.quote: From the dawn of this country, at every stage America has enjoyed God's providential blessing. Over and over again, when we face impossible odds, the American people rose to the challenge. You know, compared to that, repealing Obamacare and abolishing the IRS ain't all that tough.

politicians.name: Lindsey Graham
politicians.quote: I want to be president to defeat the enemies trying to kill us, not just penalize them or criticize them or contain them, but defeat them.

politicians.name: Rand Paul
politicians.quote: If we nominate a candidate who is simply Democrat Light, what's the point? Why bother? We need to boldly proclaim our vision for America. We need to go boldly forth under the banner of liberty that clutches the Constitution in one hand and the Bill of Rights in the other.

politicians.name: Rick Perry
politicians.quote: We don't have to settle for a world in chaos and an America that shrinks from its responsibilities. We don't have to apologize for American exceptionalism or Western values.

politicians.name: Marco Rubio
politicians.quote: in many countries the highest office in the land is reserved for the rich and the powerful, but I live in an exceptional country. . . where the son of a bartender and a maid can have the same dreams, and the same future as those who've come from power and privilege.

politicians.name: Bernie Sanders
politicians.quote: We can’t continue having a nation in which we have the highest rate of childhood poverty of any major nation on Earth, at the same time as we’re seeing a proliferation of millionaires and billionaires.

politicians.name: Rick Santorum
politicians.quote: It's time we have a president who sees the struggle of working families in America not as an opportunity to divide us along race or class, but as a chance to unite us around the ideal that every child in America deserves her birthright, to be raised by her parents in a healthy home.

politicians.name: Lincoln Chafeee
politicians.quote: we have prodigious repair work to do in the Middle East and North Africa. We have to change our thinking. We have to find a way to wage peace.

politicians.name: Martin O’Malley
politicians.quote: I have got news for the bullies of Wall Street. The presidency is not a crown to be passed back and forth by you between two royal families. It is a sacred trust to be earned from the American people and exercised on behalf of the people of these United States.

politicians.name: George Pataki
politicians.quote: the challenges of a large and oppressive government in Washington are real, but this is still America. The power of freedom is real, and compared to those challenges we've overcome in the past, these seem like trivial things. I have no doubt we will rise above these as well.

politicians.name: Mike Hucakbee
politicians.quote: Many of our politicians have surrendered to the false god of judicial supremacy, which would allow black-robed and unelected judges the power to make law as well as enforce it, upending the equality of our three branches of government as well as the separation of powers so very central to the Constitution.

politicians.name: Carly Fiorina
politicians.quote: If you're tired of the sound bites, the vitriol, the pettiness, the egos, the corruption; if you believe that it's time to declare the end of identity politics; if you believe that it's time to declare the end of lowered expectations; if you believe that it's time for citizens to stand up to the political class and say enough, then join us,"
